name: Connect 4 in Row Classic Game
description:
Play the classic four in line game with our app, enjoy this kind and bright family game and have fun with Connect 4 in Row Classic Game!
The artificial intelligence of the computer is your opponent today! It’s crafty, cunning and very clever, but it also adapts to the level of the rival, so even little kids can win this battle and become kings (or queens) of the game!

The game itself is simple enough – it is a two-player game in which each one chooses a different color for your chips and by shifts launches one at a time in a panel of 7 columns x 6 rows. The objective of the game is to connect pieces of the same color forming a line horizontally, vertically or diagonally before your opponent does.

Earn points for each winning to unlock new bright backgrounds, and tokens – they can be colored, or be with cats, stars, even with fleur de lys – choose your own set! Also, you can unlock boosters like “Return move” – it would ease your play too!
Enjoy our perfect adaptation of family board game right on your device! Rules so simple that children and adults can handle it easily. The matches are fast and funny, so you won’t be disappointed! Spend bright moments playing this fun puzzle game!

Connect 4 in Row Classic Game features:
A simple and classic family board game on your device!
Variable level of difficulty – even small kids and children can paly
Fast missions and intuitive rules
Different sets of tokens and backgrounds
